attributes.action: Investigation into the running of The FA and fixing of certain decisions made
attributes.background:
If you are sick to the back teeth of your club being made an example of, please sign. 

We all spend hard earned money to go see our teams play - but when the FA can just seemingly fix decision making from a panel for its own good, that is wrong. 

This happens to all teams up and down the UK.

rejection.details: You could raise this issue with the FA.
